statusObsFailed: Virtual Camera connection failed, trying other cameras...
statusBrowserNotSupported: Your browser does not support camera access
statusUsingAlternative: Trying to connect with alternative settings...
errorNoDevice: No camera device found, please make sure Virtual Camera is started
errorPermissionDenied: Camera access denied, please check system permission settings
errorDeviceBusy: Camera is occupied by another application, please close the program using the camera
errorAborted: Camera access aborted, please try again later
permissionHelpText:
If you cannot access Virtual Camera, please check the following:
1. Make sure Virtual Camera is started
2. Confirm that system has granted camera access permission to this app
3. Check if another application is using the camera
